title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.D2EndReference
description: Gets or sets the up-to reference geometry in Direction 2 for this bidirectional linear component pattern feature.
returns: Pattern's up-to reference ( vertex , edge , face , or plane ) in Direction 2
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
To pre-select, use selection Mark = 1024.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
For more information, see the
Linear Component Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
